title: Lag since patch 6.10
body:
I ussualy had my ping stuck at 52-53 , but after this patch i can't play my ping is over 100 all the time,if im lucky i can play one game per day before it starts to increase again.
 I tried every solution , nothing worked, some people have this issue and some don't and now i dont know what to do.

replies.body:
If some games are giving you a lower consistent ping than others, then it seems your ping is a result of the pathing being provided by your ISP.  There are times where your ISP gives you an efficient path to our servers, then there are other times where your ISP gives you a less optimal path, causing further issues.  The best step I can recommend is to use our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  It should give you a health report of your connection and what steps you can take to hopefully resolve it.

I hope this helps!  Give me a heads up if you have any other questions!
And if I am  gonna call my ISP what exactly am I going to tell them ? Because my friends have the same ISP and they dont have this problems.
